name: PaisaBazaar Credit Score [CPL] IN
description:
Company Description: Paisabazaar is an aggregator to all BFSI clients, the vision of Paisabazaar is to empower the Indian consumers, help them compare and make an informed choice for their various insurance needs.

Tracking: Offline Tracking

Campaign Detail: This is a Cost per lead campaign where the publisher needs to deliver credit report generation for Paisabazaar. The advertiser is offering its affiliates to run it in with mentioned targeted cities and audiences. 

Targeting: PAN India

Campaign Objective: Deliver leads that lead to credit report generation.

name: SOS credit CZ
name_aliases:
soscredit, sos credit, soskredit, sos kredit, sospujcka, sos pujcka
soscredit.cz, soscredit cz
description:
The SOScredit CZ fast short-term loan is for everyone who has a regular income and own bank account. To get a loan immediately on your account, you need to fill in a simple form with personal data, choose the loan amount and the desired maturity date, which will take you only a few minutes. Within a few minutes, you will receive an SMS message about the status of your application and, in case of a positive decision, the money will be immediately credited to the account.

The first loan up to 10 000Kč - Free

Advantages:


	100% processing of the loan online from home, work and on the go.
	Simple and convenient - you can fill out a loan application online 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
	Fast response to the request - you will get a response in just 15 minutes.
	You can choose the most suitable repayment date and loan amount for you.
	Security of personal data - Your personal data is carefully secured and protected on our servers
	Extending the due date is easy and can be extended repeatedly up to 28 days.
	Transparent contract - no surprises await you in the form of hidden fees
	We require fewer documents, the confirmation for the payment of the loan to the client's account will take place immediately.
	We do not require any guarantees or guarantors
	We have a 100% loan discount ready for new applicants!
	Regular clients receive a discount automatically based on repeated requests and can apply it up to CZK 15,000.


Ideal applicant for a loan: employee or self-employed with an income of at least CZK 13,000

Not loaned: execution and insolvency, residence at the MU or maternity leave

Commission model:


	Payment for the 1st accepted loan
	Payment for the repeated accepted loan

name: Walutomat PL
description:
Walutomat.pl is Poland's largest social currency exchange platform, where users can individually set exchange rates and exchange directly with other customers. Walutomat acts as an intermediary in these transactions and ensures the security of the currency exchange process.

The website was established in 2009 and is one of the most popular currency exchange websites in Poland, with more than 570,000 private and business customers already using it. They complete 155,000 transactions every month. Thanks to a verification and security system, the website guarantees a high level of transaction security. Since 2009, its users have exchanged more than PLN 120 billion through it!

We carry out foreign transfers to nearly 70 countries: Albania, Andorra, Argentina Australia, Austria, Azerbaijan, Bahrain, Bangladesh, Belgium, Brazil, Bulgaria, Canada, Chile, China (incl. Hong Kong and Macau), Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Georgia, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, India, Indonesia, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Macedonia, Malaysia, Malta, Mexico, Moldova, Monaco, Montenegro, Nigeria, New Zealand, Norway, Paraguay, Portugal, Qatar, Republic of South Africa, Romania, San Marino, Singapore, Slovakia, Slovenia, South Korea, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Thailand, Taiwan, United Kingdom, Uruguay, Vietnam

The cost of foreign transfers - from PLN 0 to PLN 100, depending on the country and the method of transfer.

In addition, it is possible to make free transfers to Ukraine and from Ukraine to Poland.

We are the first Polish institution to offer SEPA Instant transfers.

What makes SEPA Instant transfers stand out?


	the processing time - it is IMMEDIATE,
	available 24/7, 365 days a year,
	it can be ordered up to the amount of EUR 100,000,
	cost: PLN 20


The website also features currency alerts, which allow you to receive text message or email notifications when a currency of your choice reaches an expected rate, allowing you to stay abreast of the currency markets and respond immediately when the rate reaches an expected level. This way there is no need to constantly check the exchange rates.

Walutomat has been repeatedly awarded for its quality of service and customer care. Amongst other things, it is the winner of the Portfel Wprost award, Portfolio Invest Cuffs Currency Exchange Website of the Year Award, the QI 2022 Gold Emblem in the Quality International 2022 contest.

WHY USE WALUTOMAT.PL?


	Possibility to exchange currencies 24/7 at a self-determined rate
	The exchange is very fast - a currency can be exchanged in as little as 15 minutes
	Fast and cost-effective international transfers to nearly 70 countries
	EUR, USD, GBP, CHF, CZK, DKK, NOK, SEK can be exchanged at the website.
	Currencies can be stored in the Currency Wallet
	Instant Transfer in EUR - SEPA Instant
	The exchange can be up to 8% cheaper than in banks and traditional exchange offices
	The only cost of exchange at Walutomat.pl is the commission charged on completed orders - the more the customer exchanges the lower it becomes (depending on the discount, it will be between 0.06 and 0.2%)
	Walutomat.pl is perfect for every customer - the website meets the needs of both companies and individuals
	Walutomat.pl supports all banks in Poland
	Fast and convenient transfer - deposit via Przelewy24, credit card, BLIK, PayPal, Google Pay, or QR code
	Convenient access to funds - withdrawals 7 days a week from 8 a.m. to 11 p.m
	Intuitive mobile application



	Ability to set currency alerts both on the website and in the customer panel



	An advantage of Walutomat.pl is the extensive experience of its experts, gained over the 13 years of its operation


 

HOW DO WE ENSURE SECURITY AT WALUTOMAT.PL?


	Currency One, the operator of Walutomat.pl, is licensed by the Polish Financial Supervision Authority to provide payment services
	Clients' data are stored securely, as required by applicable regulations.
	AML procedures
	SSL certificate, enabling advanced encryption of internet connections
	Transactions only with full coverage of funds
	Authorization by a text message or in the mobile application


PROMOTIONAL SLOGANS FOR WALUTOMAT.PL

 


	An innovative currency exchange platform. Save up to 8% on currency exchange. Check it out and open a free account at Walutomat.pl
	Join more than 570,000 satisfied users and create a free account

	Receive a 50% discount on online currency exchange

	Secure and convenient currency exchange 24/7 - Walutomat.pl
